recipe_name: Summer Salad with Burrata, Tomatoes, and Nectarines
ingredients: 3  nectarines, pitted and chopped, 2 large heirloom tomatoes, chopped, 2 (4 ounce) balls Burrata cheese, cut into 3/4-inch pieces, 2 tablespoons fresh basil, chopped, or to taste
nutrition: Total Fat 29g 38%, Saturated Fat 10g 52%, Cholesterol 40mg 13%, Sodium 216mg 9%, Total Carbohydrate 15g 6%, Dietary Fiber 3g 10%, Total Sugars 11g, Protein 10g, Vitamin C 18mg 88%, Calcium 18mg 1%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 425mg 9%
